## Elder Helper Services
### Tender Notice
#### Reference: cb-245-32484295 (Solicitation Number: 50601-24-008)

#### June 2024

The Correctional Service Canada (CSC) announces an opportunity for Elder Helper services under an Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN). This service involves providing support and supplements to the work of Elders in rehabilitation programming for Indigenous offenders.

#### Objective:
To provide elder programming to meet the needs of Indigenous offenders and improve their understanding of traditional Indigenous spirituality.

#### Tasks and Scope:
The selected service provider will assist Indigenous offenders in refugee camps and Immigration detention centers across Manitoba and Canada.

#### Key Responsibilities:
- Assist Elders in supporting Indigenous offenders on their traditional healing journey
- Provide guidance and counseling according to the traditions and teachings of the Indigenous culture
- Assist in conducting group teachings and discussions

#### Submission Requirements:
The selected Service Provider must provide a detailed Statement of Capability outlining their experience and qualifications to meet the requirements set out in the ACAN.

#### Summary:
Interested Service Providers are invited to submit a Statement of Capability in response to this notice. The Statement of Capability should include information regarding:

1. Assisting Elders and Indigenous offenders.
2. Providing counseling services according to the traditions and teachings of the Indigenous culture.
3. Conducting group discussions and teachings.
4. Assisting in the preparation of reports and providing other technical support for case management processes.

The Service Provider must provide a minimum of 2 years of experience in cumulative areas such as assisting Elders, providing counseling services, and conducting group discussions. The provider must demonstrate in writing that they have the knowledge and experience required to meet the essential requirements.

The Estimated value of the contract is $67,882.61 CAD.

The response deadline for submission of Statement of Capability is July 30, 2024 at 2:00 PM CST. Inquiries and submission of statements of capabilities should be addressed to Janet Nelson at 501contracts@csc-scc.gc.ca.

### Important Note:
This procurement is set-aside for an Indigenous Supplier in accordance with the Government Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business.
